# Gato Chateau
> Professional Cat Sitting & Boarding in Miami, Florida

## About
Gato Chateau is Miami's trusted cat care specialist, serving the community since 2017. We provide professional cat sitting, cat boarding, and comprehensive pet care services with a focus on anxious and special-needs cats. Every cat is treated like royalty with personalized attention and daily photo updates.

## Services
- Cat Boarding: Cozy sleepover at our Coral Terrace location with 24/7 supervised care
- In-Home Cat Sitting: Your cat stays comfortable in their own environment
- Drop-In Visits: Quick 30-minute check-ins for feeding and playtime
- Small Dog Boarding: We also welcome small dogs with the same royal treatment
- Medication Administration: Experienced with pills, liquids, injections, and special dietary needs
- Daily Photo Updates: Adorable photos and videos sent throughout the day

## Service Area
Based in Coral Terrace, serving:
- Coral Gables
- South Miami
- Westchester
- West Miami
- Kendall
- Coconut Grove
- Pinecrest
- And nearby areas within 10 miles
- Drop-off boarding also available at our Coral Terrace location

## Key Features
- 7+ years of experience (since 2017)
- Specializing in anxious and special-needs cats
- Personalized attention - we spend hours with each cat
- Daily photo and video updates included
- Insured and bonded
- Background checked
- Pet First Aid certified
- Available 7 days a week

- Emergency support for current clients: 24/7

## Brand Promise
At Gato Chateau, every cat is royalty! We provide the personal attention, expertise, and daily updates that give pet parents complete peace of mind while traveling.
